parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese (default)
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: MemberUid
parameters.description: The UID of the member that is managed by your Alibaba Cloud account.

parameters.name: VpcFirewallId
parameters.description:
The instance ID of the VPC firewall.

> You can call the [DescribeVpcFirewallCenList](~~345777~~) operation to query the instance IDs of VPC firewalls.

parameters.name: VpcFirewallName
parameters.description: The instance name of the VPC firewall.
